newsitem.title: ESTONIA: Estonian shares in fair activity, index up.
newsitem.headline: Estonian shares in fair activity, index up.

text.p: Estonian shares showed healthy trade on Tuesday with volumes fair on both the official and over-the-counter market and the stock market index rising, dealers said.
Trade on the official was 7.3 million kroons and 3.8 million kroons on the over-the-counter free market. The Tallinn stock exchange index added 0.22 percent and closed at 105.14.
Leading bank Hansapank ended slightly higher at 105.60 kroons and turned over 2.2 million kroons.
Tallinna Pank was next most-traded on two million kroon volume and closing at 41 kroons after 40.85.
Exhibition organiser Estonian Fairs, trading on the free market for only the second day, slumped to 44 kroons from 52 kroons amid volume of 750,000 kroons.
